author: @wsfa12news
title: Alabama Forestry Commission responds to more fires in one day than ever before
text:
Updated: 30 minutes ago
The Montgomery Police Department and U.S. Marshalls are searching for a teen from the Montgomery area charged with murder.
Updated: 30 minutes ago
As Selma prepares to host the 33rd Annual Bridge Crossing Jubilee, organizers are prioritizing public safety with a series of security measures.
Updated: 5 hours ago
La'Darius Gantt, Romero Frazier II, Jaylen Lassic, and Jaquez Myrick are each charged with discharging a firearm on school property.
Updated: 5 hours ago
The government agency said disposing of the buildings eliminates costly maintenance and allows it to reinvest in high quality work environments.
Updated: 5 hours ago
Alabama law already allows the display of it in public places like schools, but a bill before lawmakers would require it.
Updated: 7 hours ago
A deadly Wednesday morning shooting is under investigation in Montgomery.
